00043   const char *usage_str =
00044   "\n" \
00045   "usage: code_search_and_replace [OPTIONS] <file> [<file> ...]\n" \
00046   "\n" \
00047   "OPTIONS";
00048 
00049   struct lt_decreasing_length {
00050     bool operator()(const pair<string, string> &m1, const pair<string, string> &m2) const {
00051       if (m1.first == m2.first) {
00052         cout << "error: multiple mappings for '" << m1.first << "'" << endl;
00053         exit(1);
00054       }
00055       return m1.first.length() >= m2.first.length();
00056     }
00057   };
00058 
00059   bool convert_file(string input_filename, string license_filename, vector< pair<string, string> > &exchange_strings, string &converted_contents);

00068 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00069   vector< pair<string, string> > exchange_strings;
00070   string converted_contents;
00071   string orig_name;
00072   string backup_name;
00073   string license_name;
00074   char *ptr;
00075 
00076   System::initialize(System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00077 
00078   try {
00079 
00080     po::options_description generic(usage_str);
00081     generic.add_options()
00082       ("help", "Display this help message")
00083       ("map-file", po::value<string>(), "File containing lines of string mappings of the form:  <from> '\\t' <to>")
00084       ("mapping", po::value< vector<string> >(), "String mapping.  Example: --mapping=\"foo\\tbar\"")
00085       ("license-file", po::value<string>(), "File containing source code header comment")
00086       ;
00087 
00088     // Hidden options: server location
00089     po::options_description hidden("Hidden options");
00090     hidden.add_options()
00091       ("input-file", po::value< vector<string> >(), "input file")
00092       ;
00093 
00094     po::options_description cmdline_options;
00095     cmdline_options.add(generic).add(hidden);
00096 
00097     po::positional_options_description p;
00098     p.add("input-file", -1);
00099 
00100     po::variables_map vm;
00101     store(po::command_line_parser(argc, argv).
00102           options(cmdline_options).positional(p).run(), vm);
00103     po::notify(vm);
00104 
00105     if (vm.count("help") || vm.count("input-file") == 0) {
00106       cout << generic << "\n";
00107       return 1;
00108     }
00109 
00110     if (vm.count("map-file") == 0 && vm.count("license-file") == 0 && vm.count("mapping") == 0) {
00111       cout << "error: --map-file, --mapping, and/or --license-file must be supplied." << endl;
00112       return 1;
00113     }
00114 
00115     vector<string> input_file, mapping;
00116 
00117     input_file = vm["input-file"].as< vector<string> >();
00118 
00119     if (vm.count("mapping"))
00120       mapping = vm["mapping"].as< vector<string> >();
00121 
00122     if (vm.count("license-file"))
00123       license_name = vm["license-file"].as<string>();
00124 
00125     for (size_t i=0; i<mapping.size(); i++) {
00126       if ((ptr = strstr(mapping[i].c_str(), "\\t")) == 0) {
00127         cout << "error: bad mapping - " << mapping[i] << endl;
00128         return 1;
00129       }
00130       *ptr = 0;
00131       ptr += 2;
00132       exchange_strings.push_back(make_pair(mapping[i].c_str(), ptr));
00133     }
00134 
00135     if (vm.count("map-file")) {
00136       std::ifstream mappings_in(vm["map-file"].as< string >().c_str());
00137       std::string line;
00138 
00139       while (getline(mappings_in, line)) {
00140         boost::trim(line);
00141         if (line != "") {
00142           char *line_ptr = (char *)line.c_str();
00143           if ((ptr = strstr(line_ptr, "\t")) == 0) {
00144             cout << "error: bad mapping - " << line << endl;
00145             return 1;
00146           }
00147           *ptr++ = 0;
00148           exchange_strings.push_back(make_pair(line_ptr, ptr));
00149         }
00150       }
00151     }
00152 
00153     {
00154       struct lt_decreasing_length sort_obj;
00155       sort(exchange_strings.begin(), exchange_strings.end(), sort_obj);
00156     }
00157 
00158     for (size_t i=0; i<input_file.size(); i++) {
00159       converted_contents = "";
00160       cout << "Converting '" << input_file[i] << "'" << endl << flush;
00161       if (!convert_file(input_file[i], license_name, exchange_strings, converted_contents))
00162         cerr << "Problem converting '" << input_file[i] << "'" << endl;
00163       else {
00164         orig_name = input_file[i];
00165         backup_name = input_file[i] + ".old";
00166         unlink(backup_name.c_str());
00167         rename(orig_name.c_str(), backup_name.c_str());
00168         {
00169           ofstream fout(input_file[i].c_str());
00170           fout << converted_contents;
00171           fout.close();
00172         }
00173       }
00174     }
00175 
00176   }
00177   catch(exception& e) {
00178     cerr << "error: " << e.what() << "\n";
00179   }
00180   catch(...) {
00181     cerr << "Exception of unknown type!\n";
00182   }
00183 
00184 }

00186 namespace {
00187 
00188   struct ReplaceInfo {
00189     off_t offset;
00190     const char *from_string;
00191     const char *to_string;
00192   };
00193 
00194   struct LtReplaceInfo {
00195     bool operator()(const ReplaceInfo &ri1, const ReplaceInfo &ri2) const {
00196       return ri1.offset < ri2.offset;
00197     }
00198   };
00199 
00200   bool convert_file(string input_filename, string license_filename, vector< pair<string, string> > &exchange_strings, string &converted_contents) {
00201     off_t last_offset, flen, license_len;
00202     char *fcontents = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(input_filename.c_str(), &flen);
00203     char *ptr = fcontents;
00204     char *code_start, *base;
00205     ReplaceInfo rinfo;
00206     vector<ReplaceInfo> rivec;
00207 
00208     if (fcontents == 0)
00209       return false;
00210 
00211     if (license_filename != "") {
00212 
00213       converted_contents = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(license_filename.c_str(), &license_len);
00214 
00215       boost::trim(converted_contents);
00216       converted_contents += "\n\n";
00217 
00218       while (true) {
00219 
00220         while (*ptr && isspace(*ptr))
00221           ptr++;
00222 
00223         if (strncmp(ptr, "/*", 2)) {
00224           cerr << "Comment header not found in '" << input_filename << "'" << endl;
00225           return false;
00226         }
00227 
00228         if ((ptr = strstr(ptr, "*/")) == 0) {
00229           cerr << "Unable to find end of comment header in '" << input_filename << "'" << endl;
00230           return false;
00231         }
00232 
00233         ptr += 2;
00234 
00235         while (*ptr && isspace(*ptr))
00236           ptr++;
00237 
00238         if (strncmp(ptr, "/*", 2))
00239           break;
00240       }
00241 
00242     }
00243 
00244     code_start = ptr;
00245 
00246     for (size_t i=0; i<exchange_strings.size(); i++) {
00247       base = code_start;
00248       while ((ptr = strstr(base, exchange_strings[i].first.c_str())) != 0) {
00249         rinfo.offset = ptr - fcontents;
00250         rinfo.from_string = exchange_strings[i].first.c_str();
00251         rinfo.to_string = exchange_strings[i].second.c_str();
00252         rivec.push_back(rinfo);
00253         base = ptr + strlen(exchange_strings[i].first.c_str());
00254       }
00255     }
00256 
00257     if (!rivec.empty()) {
00258       LtReplaceInfo ascending;
00259       sort(rivec.begin(), rivec.end(), ascending);
00260     }
00261 
00262     last_offset = code_start - fcontents;
00263     for (size_t i=0; i<rivec.size(); i++) {
00264       cerr << "Replace at offset " << rivec[i].offset << endl << flush;
00265       converted_contents += string(fcontents + last_offset, rivec[i].offset-last_offset);
00266       converted_contents += rivec[i].to_string;
00267       last_offset = rivec[i].offset + strlen(rivec[i].from_string);
00268     }
00269 
00270     converted_contents += string(fcontents + last_offset, flen-last_offset);
00271 
00272     return true;
00273   }
00274 
00275 }
